allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$files = @\(''src\\pages\\setup\\AddUsers.tsx'',''src\\pages\\app\\WorkOrders.tsx'',''src\\pages\\app\\UserManagement.tsx'',''src\\pages\\app\\Reports.tsx'',''src\\pages\\app\\MaintenancePlanning.tsx'',''src\\pages\\app\\MachineDetails.tsx'',''src\\pages\\app\\MachinesList.tsx'',''src\\pages\\setup\\AddMachines.tsx'',''src\\components\\dashboard\\TrendLineChart.tsx''\); foreach \($f in $files\) { $path = Join-Path ''C:\\Users\\Sara\\Desktop\\minimaxi\\predictive-maintenance'' $f; if \(Test-Path $path\) { $content = Get-Content $path -Raw; $newContent = $content.Replace\(""''#2d2d2d''"", ""''#283444''""\); if \($content -ne $newContent\) { Set-Content -Path $path -Value $newContent -NoNewline; Write-Host ""Replaced #2d2d2d in $f"" } else { Write-Host ""No #2d2d2d found in $f"" } } else { Write-Host ""File not found: $f"" } }")
